text: Meg Griffin is a character in the television comedy Family Guy. == Overview == At age 18, she is the oldest child of Lois Griffin and Peter Griffin. She has two younger siblings, Chris and Stewie. Meg is one of the most hated members of her family and is bullied and humorlessly abused by her own family and friends because she is believed very ugly by everybody, except by a nerd at her school who has a crush on Meg, that she doesn't want. Category:Animated human characters Category:Family Guy characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999
title: Meg Griffin
